groundhog 1.0.2
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

Exported functions

Functions exported by groundhog

groundhog.library()

Install packages as available on set date - groundhog.library()

toc()

Show table of contents (toc) (package versions and publication dates) for a package, sorted chronologically

cross.toc()

Show toc table with multiple packages

get.groundhog.folder()

Get groundhog folder location

set.groundhog.folder()

Set groundhog folder location

Internal functions

Package/version listing

load.cran.toc()

Load cran.toc

update_cran.toc_if.needed()

Update cran.toc if it's not recent enough to include the required date.

get.R.pkg.date()

Get date of binary package from MRAN, given R version being used

get.date.for.install.binary()

Get date of binary package-version availability for current R version, on MRAN

get.version()

Get version from date

is.pkg_vrs.installed()

Is pkg_vrs installed (within same R-minor version)?

r.version.check()

Compare R versions

msg.R.switch()

Message about R version switch

check.mismatch.R()

Check mismatch between R versions

get.active()

Get active packages

get.installed_path()

Check if package version is installed for current or past R versions,

get.pkg_search_paths()

Get package search path

Install functions

install.snowball()

Install snowball

install.source()

Install package from source

Dependency solving

get.dependencies()

Get dependencies for one package

get.all.dependencies()

Get recursive dependencies

get.snowball()

Generates dataframe with all dependencies needed to install a package, with version and source of installation

check.snowball.conflict()

Check snowball conflict

Feedback functions

get.installation.time()

Get installation time

estimate.seconds.left()

Estimate seconds left in install

installation.feedback()

Installation feedback

Other utility functions

as.DateYMD()

Format Y-M-D as date
